:::Herald looks at the spark of Defection and sinks to its side:::

"Defection dont leave!"

then he got an idea he took defections spark and focused on it the spark 
grew, and grew, and grew until it was the size of Defections body. herald 
then gave the spark back to defections body. then Herald said

"Half my spark to make you whole, its strength to counter act your weakness. 
Rise and be whole!!!!!!"

Defection rose grinned then teleported to the battle he walked over to Hot 
Rod and said

"I am the new Defection and I alone will kill you!"

Defection fired a n energon blast point blank at Hot Rods Spark
